name: Agent Edge Dye Grey/Orange
description:
The Agent is a slim style, designed to look great with smart or casual trousers, or with a suit. The strap is 1in wide. 

Handcrafted in England from the finest naturally Veg Tanned Belgian leather. The contrasting edge colour is painstakingly applied by hand. It takes up to 3 coats to achieve the vibrancy of the edge colour. This belt takes more than 3 hours to create in the workshop.

Comes with solid brass single prong buckle. Buckles can be chrome plated - please request this in the notes section.

If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

name: Scroll Mock Croc Edge-Dye
description:
The Scroll is a slim style, designed to look great with smart or casual trousers, or with a suit. The strap is 1.25in wide. 

Handcrafted in England from the finest naturally Veg Tanned Belgian leather. The contrasting edge colour is painstakingly applied by hand. It takes up to 3 coats to achieve the vibrancy of the edge colour. This belt takes more than 3 hours to create in the workshop. The leather is embossed with the mock croc design.

Comes with solid brass single prong buckle. Buckles can be chrome plated - please request this in the notes section.

If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

name: Leather Wristband 'Word'
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss, using finest Belgian or Italian leather. The 'Word' series of wristbands are themed with the friendly, shortened words we use when signing off e-mails and text messages. 'Yours', 'Best', 'Warmest' and 'Word'! 

Letters are hand-embossed into the leather. The wristband is fastened at the back with a solid brass John Brown screw, which just pops neatly through a slot in the leather. The brightly coloured contrasting edge dye is hand applied.

Shown here in Black/Yellow

name: Leather Wristband 'Yours'
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss, using finest Belgian or Italian leather. The 'Word' series of wristbands are themed with the friendly, shortened words we use when signing off e-mails and text messages. 'Yours', 'Best', 'Warmest' and 'Word'!

name: Discus Edge-Dye
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass circular buckle. The strap is 1.25in wide, great for denim or casual tailoring.

Colours available are Whisky Tan, Black and Chestnut Brown strap with Aqua edge dye. The contrast colour edge-dye is hand applied.

If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

Photo By Jo

name: Buccaneer Edge-Dye
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass buckle. 

The contrasting edge colour is painstakingly applied by hand. It takes up to 3 coats to achieve the vibrancy of the edge colour. This belt takes more than 3 hours to create in the workshop.

The Buccaneer has a slightly slimmer strap than a normal jeans belt - 1.25in - which means it looks great with jeans and also sits comfortably worn with tailored smart/casual trousers.

Please contact us if your size is not listed below. All belts are made bespoke to order which can take up to 10 working days before delivery. Pleased notify us if your order is urgent.

description:

Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss.

description:

Available in a variety of colours, with matching leather thong stitching.
Black 
Navy Blue

name: Classic Eternal
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass 2 prong buckle. The Classic Medieval has a combination of hand applied embellishments. The first segment has continuous studs along the edges, the rest of the belt has thong stitching in red, natural and black sections. 

 If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

Photos: ©Photo By Jo

description:

Premium embossed leather. 

Solid brass buckle and D-ring. Available in black and chestnut brown.

name: Scroll
description:
The Scroll is a slightly slimmer style than a normal jeans belt, 1.25 inch wide strap. Designed to look great with smart or casual trousers as well as jeans.

Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss, from the finest naturally Veg Tanned Belgian or Italian leather. 

Available in Black, Brown, Slate Grey, Burgundy and Navy Blue. Comes with solid brass single prong buckle. 

Buckles can be chrome plated - please request this in the notes section.

Please note: If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

name: Medieval Loop-D
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather. The studs are individually hand-applied. With solid brass belt loop and d-ring. The strap is 1.5in wide.

Available in Black or brown. If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

name: Classic Medieval Loop-D
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass 2 prong buckle. The studs and thong are individually hand-applied

This belt has everything. Part thonged in contrast leather, part studded, then thonged in matching leather. With solid brass belt loop and d-ring. The strap is 1.5in wide.

Available in Black or red. If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

name: Edge-Crease
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass 2 prong buckle. 

The Edge-Crease is essentially a plain belt. with a simple edge-crease line applied around the edges. The strap is 1.5in wide, the width of a classic jeans belt.

Colours available are Racing Green, Black and Burgundy.

If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.

name: Count Exquisite
description:
Handcrafted in England by Pete Voss. Made from premium Belgian or Italian leather, with solid brass two prong buckle. The Count Exquisite has a 1.5inch wide strap - a standard jeans belt width. The Count Exquisite is perfect in it's simplicity, no embellishments. This versatile style looks great with casual tailoring as well as jeans.

Colours available are Navy, Black and Chestnut Brown.

 If your size does not appear below contact us for bespoke size.

Please note, all belts are made to order and delivery in the UK may take up to 2 weeks. Please contact us if your order is urgent.
